content.detailedDescription:
I was walking around the block with my 18mo old son, as we do every evening around 7pm.  it was partly cloudy.  i happened to look up, and saw a brilliantly 'white' cigar shaped/thin line object.  it was moving much faster than anything i have ever seen, and moved in a straight line across the sky.  slow enough that i watched it for about 4-5 seconds, but fast enough that it made me wonder what it was.  it eventually went in or behind a large cloud and i no longer could see it.  the object did not emit any trail or light per se, but it was so bright - almost like a mirror reflecting light.  from my point of view, it was the size of grain of rice.  it had no tails or lights that i could see.  there were no other visible objects in the sky, and there was no sound.
i never take my phone with me on our walks, as i have no where to put it in my running shorts.  so unfortunately i do not have a photo.  but, ive attached photos from google images, to get an idea of what i saw.  

basically: 

a bright white horizontal line moving east in a straight steady line.

photo 1 = it looked like o1
photo 2 = pretty much exactly what i saw, but no blur at all.  it was level.      
          & very distinct
photo 3 = picture with caption "cigar shaped mothership"
content.summary: Brilliantly bright cigar/thin rectangular fast object in daylight...

content.detailedDescription: Event occur over laprairie, qc. the object was stationary flashed a few time and disapear. at first, we (me and my wife) thought it was an helicopter with lights like police choppers, but no there was no beam and no sound. after the event we kept looking all around us. a few planes in the sky but was easy to identify.
content.summary: Bright orange light flashing a few times then disapear. round penny shape

content.detailedDescription:
Hot night, went outside and observed bats chasing bugs, then noted star-like object to the west (just south of eugene airport) before any true stars were yet visible.  got binoculars and began observing. saw self-illuminated object, constant light, which did not appear to be moving.  over time, however, it did change location. when first observed it was to the south of the tallest tree to the west, eventually it was directly above the tree, then within 50 minutes it was to the north of the same tree.  at first i thought it was a star, yet it was too light outside to view any stars at 9:10 pm.  suspicious, i observed it through binoculars, and it was obviously not a star, rather a self-illuminated object.  i could not detect movement, object seemed to hover soundlessly, yet over 40-50 minutes i observed it, it made its way nw of its original position.  i felt an excited anticipation to be observing such an object.  i went inside periodically to write down what i was observing.  i observed the object until it moved so far to the nw that it disappeared behind the trees to the west of my house.  had it remained, i would have stayed outside observing, continuing to observe the object. i did take a photo of the "orb." 

earlier this year (in the spring)i had observed a glowing orb that meandered soundlessly and slowly (yet with observable movement)at less than 500 feet, so i have been taking note of unusual lights ever since.  this is the first similar object i have observed, still this object was at a greater distance from me and behaved differently than the meandering object (also self-illuminated) seen previously.  this object seemed to glow with a whiter light than the meandering orb, the light of which had more of a yellow glow to it.

during my observation at least 3 airplanes took off or landed and must have been able to see it!
content.summary: Object appeared star-like prior to stars being observable(too light outside).Observed w/binoculars, lighted orb,just south of airport. changed location over time but could not ascertain movement except over time.

content.detailedDescription: 3 bright orange fireballs seen over the hershey, pa area. stayed stationary the entire duration and did not lose altitude at any time, as aerial flares would do. each of the lights would randomly flicker and "turn off" and then "turn back on" in the same position. lasted about 6 minutes before theyd just seemed to turn off the lights one by one.
content.summary: 3 fireballs in a triangular formation

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck watching a a lightening and thunder storm approaching.I was watching the sky when i saw this reddish orange ball of light traveling in the sky coming over the trees and then i ran to the other side of deck to see it disappear in the trees.At that point i screamed for my husband to come out and started to tell him what i had just seen,when he said there it is and another one appeared and went in the same direction and disappeared.At that point we were both kind of confused what we had just seen and went in the house.I actually first thought it was some kind of plane but when it was in view we could see it wasn't. it moved like a plane. it wasn't a plane my husband suggested ball lightening but it didn't fit the criteria. we both started feeling like we may have just seen an unidentified flying object. it wasn't like a flash in the sky.It moved like an airplane would.
content.summary: It was the beginning of a storm it was lightening and thundering when i saw this orangish redball of light in the sky. i thought it was an airplane at first but it just went across the sky behind .My house. and then a other one followed it. it made no sou

content.detailedDescription:
First of all let me say i am not saying this is a ufo or many ufos or anything such, heck i am not even saying its a flying object, i will upload the files here and you can judge for yourself and if possible please tell me what the heck it is!

this was during my vacation just a few days back, we went to venice - italy and i was on a boat which would take us to our stop (its like a bus service, but with boats, a "water bus"), i stood up, pointed my camera out of the window (there was no glass in front of me, my camera was dangling over the water) and took three pictures of a building.

i did not see nor notice anything unusual.

after spending 3 more days there i came back home and put the memory card in the reader and was going through my pictures when i noticed some triangle lights in one of the pictures.
i immediately looked at the other two pictures i had of that set and i spotted the lights again, but they had moved...

i called my family and we stared at the pictures trying to guess what could have made those lights and started ruling out stuff:
they are not stars
nor a reflection from the window (head was out of the window) / water (i was over 10ft above).

it just looked weird, especially the perfect triangle lights.

the strange thing is we all (around 3 of my family and other passengers on the boat) looked out of the boat window and didnt notice any of these "things" / lights, it only showed up later when i took the memory card from the camera.

i will attach the raw images that i took with my camera (canon 5d mark 3 using a canon 50mm 1.4 prime lens)
i swear they are untouched by me or anyone else, and would just like to know what it is.

thanks!
r

note: these are "raw" .Cr2 files, you will need a professional editing program like lightroom or adobe bridge or canon's own free software to open and view the files.
i did not convert it to jpg or anything else before sending it to you so you can have all the data from the pictures.
if you find out something, please let me know, even if its something silly like flares (unlikely) or planets (even more unlikely) or little green glowing men :))
content.summary: Spotted lights after viewing camera images when i came back home

content.detailedDescription: July 24th at around 1am, i went outside to pick up the tree debris that had landed in the street infront of our house when i saw 2 bright orbs of orange-red light coming from the south and heading north, about 2 blocks over from us. moving kindof slow then speeding up, but not severely fast, i could still see them for quite a while since there was no light from the streets.. the electricity had been knocked out and about an hour before, and all the transformers in our area blew due to the crazy storm that had blown thru about an hour an a half earlier.
content.summary: After a storm, saw 2 big balls of orange/red light above treetops moving in a straight line towards the north

content.detailedDescription: I just went outside to look at the moon then i saw it i was there for 10-15 min untell a second one appeared when i got my friend it latter was gone as my friend went to get her ipod to take a picture i was waiting the it stated moving north we struggled with the ipod to get a picture. it was gone and untell now is her ipod now working
content.summary: It was huge light me and my friend saw it an small air craft nothing like the ufo

content.detailedDescription: Just got to work seen the moon and thought i take a photo of it, about the 3 rd photo a blue moon like thing show up to the left of the moon. that night as i was looking at the photo the 4 photo has a beam of light to the right of the moon. out of the 5 photo only 2 had something in it.
content.summary: A blue moon like object just left of the moon in one photo and a beam of light in the next photo just to the right of the moon

content.detailedDescription: Looking west out of my apartment door on stollypark road i look at the stars as im smoking my cigarette and one certain point of light looked odd to me, or like i had never seen a star look or act that way... when you just looked at it it looked like a floating orb, or star but when i focused on it and actually watched it for over 20 minutes shapeshift, change color, hover still, go up, down. it looked like it was bobing in the air. i kept watching and saw it shooting out little orbs and sometimes the one orb would turn into two, then back to one. it seemed at times to be rotating very very fast or at least the very bottom of it was. when i focused, the orb of light seemed to have little lights within it, spinning around its venter. i focused on the area around the orb to see what else i could manage to see, it seemed like the orb had a force field that i could see when the object would move because it would make the space around it ripple and warp the area around it, like droping a rock into water but in a closed ball around this object.. then points of light began to appear, hover, then instantly vanish and appear somewhere else.. i was standing watching all this happen with my mother and she saw the exact same thing. a couple times i could have swore i saw little beams of light shoot off the object like solor flares off the sun, it would just shoot of it almost like a jet of gas would look. im not sure if this was a craft with being inside it, or if it itself was the being, hovering as an orb or light, then shifting, changing shape, becomming two, then merging together again, random bulges and twisting motions and rolling made it look like it couldnt decide what it wanted to look like .
content.summary: 2nd sighting in my life, this one was witnessed with my mother in the parking lot of my apartment building.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2115 hrs, a white cylinder-cigar shaped object was personally witnessed over the eastern side of the sky. object was seen stationary for approximately 5 seconds.  the white cylinder object was reflecting a white bright glow.  the object then released a secondary white light that began from the left and moved the right-end of the object (similar to a copy machine light scan). when the bright light reached the right side of the object, the cylinder moved at high speed to the western sky.  the fast movement of the light created a temporary light trail to the naked eye for a second.  the cylinder then became stationary in the sky for another 5 seconds before a large bright flash engulfed the cylinder itself and disappeared from the sky.
content.summary: White glowing cynlinder-cigar  shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and her friend luz are the witnesses. 
i had to speak with her friend, because my mom really didn't wanted to talk or think about it. 
she said- we were driving on the highway , getting off of 520 , trying to get into 195 north... we see a lots of police due to a deathly accident. i asked one of the police man, how to get the best route to get home. after driving approximately 10 minutes through a working on road (nobody working at that time) my mom, the one driving, asked her friend, - if those lights were a plane, do you see that. -from what luz were telling me.. she said, they stated driving slow, then it stop in front of the car, she described it as triangular with grenn lights and red lights in the middle of a circular shape. to be honest, she wants somebody to talk about this. she wants answers, im trying yo explain her because i watch alot of ufo programs on history channel. please, call me as soon as possible.
content.summary: Triangular

content.detailedDescription:
7.23.13
    i was driving home from the auto parts store in hammonton, n.J. and had to stop at friends house to drop off some oil that he needed to top off his vehicle. we spoke for a few minutes and as we were conversing i was looking towards the white horse pike (rt. 30) where a dealership is located. while my friend was speaking i witnessed a distinct blue-green (more of a mid-aqua), oval shaped, orb rapidly descend. it was a vertical oval that emitted an aqua color. the instance only lasted about 2 seconds, but it was very clear that it was an oval, brightly lit (in a way), object that descended very rapidly. 

the highest i observed could have been a couple of miles up as i don't have anything i could reference to get a more accurate measurement. it descended to maybe 15-20 degrees above the horizon. granted a tree blocked some of my view as it neared the lowest observable altitude. but i could definitely see it through the branches. the part i witnessed un-obscured it did not leave a tail or blur above it (as it moved straight down). it seemed more of a rapid descent than a free fall. it was not a blinding bright light, but bright enough that it immediately drew my attention towards it. i quickly told my friend to look and asked my friend if he had seen what i just witnessed, but he was looking at me while speaking. he turned in the direction i observed the object, but he was too late. i explained what i saw but he didn't seem too impressed. i even walked into the neighbors yard to try and get a better look and maybe even see a fire or smoke in the distance fearing it was an aircraft that may have crashed. many airplanes were in the night sky, but they seemed to keep on their path. 

about 10-20 seconds after the sighting it occurred to me to check the time on my phone just incase it coincides with something else later. the clock on the phone read 9:55. the earliest it could have been when i saw the object is 9:54:40 (40 seconds after 9:55.) i didn't see anything and kept talking to my friend for a few minutes before heading home. as i drove home (less than .5 miles away) my curiosity got the best of me so i decided to travel in the direction of the objects would-be landing area. i drove for about 15 minutes but didn't see helicopters, planes, or emergency vehicles anywhere to give a clue as to the location. i gave up and decided to go home. when i went on google maps, i realized that i was traveling a bit too far north of the direction i observed the object.

i included a screen shot of the map with red line depicting the direction i was facing when i saw the object. the blue lines shows a broader field of vision to help narrow down the possible sighting direction. (not sure if i explained myself very well there). i don't believe the object was a comet, meteor, plane, or left over fireworks from the 4th of july. the object did not change brightness, nor did it sparkle, flash, leave a trail, tail, or anything of the sort. it was a solid aqua glow as it rapidly descended. maybe someone else just happened to be looking at the same direction at the same moment as myself and can back me up, or at least give a clue as to what it may have been. it was like as falling gem in the sky.
content.summary: Blue-green orb observed descending west of waterford, nj.

content.detailedDescription:
Was in back yard after rain storm most of the day when i looked up saw two pulsating light spheres or a greenish whiter light making circular patterns. i called my son out to observe make sure i was seeing what i was seeing. we both witnessed the ufo���s and they kept making a circular pattern over the downtown area of beverly, we also witness three commercial airlines since we are not far from the approach to logan airport in boston. those plans you could make out until the disappeared into the cloud cover and could hear their engines. 
these object were silent and appeared to be in the cloud cover, as i write this they are still in their circular pattern
content.summary: Was in back yard after rain storm most of the day when i looked up say two pulsating light spheres or a greenish whiter light making circular patterns

content.detailedDescription: I was enjoying free time with a friend at his apartment outside of our military base approx. 10:00 p.M. i went out for a smoke on the north side of the building and movement in the sky to my right caught my attention. i initial began to filter (within seconds) what my natural interpretation of the object was. plane, helicopter etc. and could draw no obvious explanation. the object was silent, drifted north to south. it was triangle in shape. i could see a full solute of the object. it was near black color, stood out from the night sky (object was a lighter shade of black). it had clearly defined edges. i recall a point of light on each three points of the triangle, soft orange with a constant soft glow. my thoughts were clear that given the proximity, altitude and silence it could not be readily identified as an typical flying object.  today i still have difficulty compiling a rational expiation to explain it as conventional aircraft other than a very oddly shape blimp of some kind. during the sighting i felt calm and confused. i don���t recall even telling my friends when i went back into the apartment. i observed the object until i lost sight of it behind the three story apartment complex. the duration of the observation was approximately 15-30 seconds.
content.summary: Triangle craft hovered slowly south toward military base

content.detailedDescription:
The object was seen moving north-east from michigan. it was a reddish light that changed slowly toward a bluish hue. it did not look like an airplane or helicopter. it flew below cloud level, crossed the st mary's river into ontario, canada, and continued north-east. its motion was steady but seemed to accelerate slightly then return to its original speed. 
    as it passed, we noticed that the light either went out or had been projecting from the forward side only. when it was above us, we noticed that it was egg-shaped and dark in colour. there were no flashing lights and no sound. the body seemed to be striped, as if made of bands. it continued on under the clouds until it disappeared from sight. several times as it receded, i lost sight of it. at its farthest visible distance, i could see it only with my peripheral vision. there was one other witness.
content.summary: The light was visible as it approached. after it passed, the object gave no light. it moved at a fair pace but sped up slightly and slowed again.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my living room watching tv when a light caught my eye outside the window . i got up out of my chair to look at it better at first i thought it was an airplane with a engine on fire but then as i looked closer it was pulsating red orange vertical lights and i felt might hair stand on end and goosebumps all over almost like lightening in area and a feeling there was something more there  . i then ran out my front door and observed the light just going behind trees and a second coming into view going same pace as first which i also lost sight of behind trees . they were both heading in a north northeast to south direction and i heard no noise coming from them . it was a very cloudy night no moon or stars showing at time .
content.summary: I observed two red orange pulsating lights evenly spaced apart and moving at equal pace from ne to s direction

content.detailedDescription:
I pulled into the albertsons parking lot. as i was rolling up my window, i saw two "stars" converging on one another in the sky. i thought "those planes are going to hit one another." then it occurred to me that planes flying over us look like planes, not stars.  i rolled up the window and got out of the car and continued to watch. the 2 "stars" were joined by another and then 2 more.  they then moved just a bit farther in to the east and formed: a triangle (3 stars), then a rudimentary house shape (5 stars). one of the stars went farther away and just stayed in that spot while the other 4 proceeded to form a diagonal line in the sky, similar to this: / (not connected, of course).  i looked around to see if anyone else was noticing this, and no one was on the parking lot near me.  the few people closer to the store were oblivious.  i looked up again, and had to squint in order to find them again.  sure enough, they were still in that / formation, with that 5th one farther away.  at this point, i decided that i had to get on with my day and went into the store.  however, within minutes, i went back out because i realized i hadn't closed my passenger window in all the excitement.  when i got back outside, i looked up, but couldn't see them in the sky at all.   
this is the only sighting i've ever personally witnessed.  i have no idea what these were, but i felt no fear.  i was fascinated.  i wish i had my camera with me and could share a video or photo.  however, i had to squint in order to see them at times, so not sure a photo/video would have shown it. 
i almost forgot-- they looked about the size of a star in the night sky, but when i squinted a bit, they kind of had a bit of red to them.  mostly they just looked white, like they were reflecting light.  
they seemed to be "floating" as opposed to having an engine, but that is just my speculation.  i would think they were satellites, except that they formed shapes!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star-like objects in broad daylight  hovering and forming shapes

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from camp pendleton outside of the basilone gate wgen i noticed a large, glowing, cylindrical object flying at about 50 knots and at a steep nosedive land into the water. it made barely any splash and no sound that i could hear. the object left a greenish luminescent trail behind it as it landed and glew for a few seconds in the water. 

i tried to see if it was just maybe a green light reflecting off of my windshield and maybe i was just seeing thi ngs but i could not recreate the sighting. i am not the only person to see the onject but others wish not to come forth
content.summary: A green glowing cigar shaped object nose dived into the pacific ocean

content.detailedDescription: I was at a concert with some friends a long time ago and i took a picture of a friends face without him knowing, like a oke. but when i looked at the picture i saw something in the background. the first thing i thought was it was a ufo, because im into all that stuff, and conspiracies, things like that. and my friend said it was probably a bug and i said no, because it was too high up and far away, it looks more like an object, or something flying, it also reminded me of those dementors from harry potter. soo i dont know anything about it, i have seen ufos with my eyes recently and also in the ast but i have never caught one on camera on accident.
content.summary: I was at a concert with friends. took a picture of friends face as joke. found something in background.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was on the 11-7 shift at work on sat. july 20,2013 into sun. july 21,2913. about 1:10 am or so we were sitting outside on break facing basically to the west when i noticed a red sphere appear over one of the buildings in the distance. there was an orange security light in our eyes but this object was a solid red color that appeared to be brighter. that's what caught my attention. i got up to get a closer look. it then traveled west to northeast on a steady rise about tree level and disappeared. it was partly cloudy and the moon was to our left. this lasted about 30 seconds. 
  then another red sphere appeared and one of the ladies on break saw this one and said what the hell is that? i said that's why i got up to get a better look as there was one right before this one. we watched as it did basically the same thing as the first object and disappeared too. about 30-40 seconds for this one too. we thought maybe it was those chinese lanterns but there was no flickering of the object and it stayed a solid red with no glow or exhaust to it. there also was no sound to it. they both could have disappeared behind the clouds. not sure but they both just appeared on the horizon. they didn't rise up. they were just there then they rose up a bit and traveled left to right. there didn't appear to be any wind blowing at the time where we were sitting.
  the pictures are of the second object. the first one is what we saw with the naked eye. i enlarged the picture for a little more detail.
content.summary: Saw a red ball appear and rise up to travel left to right then disappeared. then another red sphere appear and travel basically the same path and disapeared

content.detailedDescription: I went outside the shop to have a cigarette. i noticed how pretty the sun looked behind the clouds and decided to take a picture. i didn't like that the first one had the trailer a connex box in it, so i walked out into the field and took another. i uploaded the photo (portrait layout) to facebook and noticed the unknown object in the picture. i didn't actually see it before the picture because the sun was bright. i have both pictures (uploaded), taken maybe 30 seconds apart. photos taken with my iphone 4.
content.summary: Tood a picture of the sunrise, posted it to facebook and noticed this.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside the shop to have a cigarette. i noticed how pretty the sun looked behind the clouds and decided to take a picture. i didn't like that the first one had the trailer a connex box in it, so i walked out into the field and took another. i uploaded the photo (portrait layout) to facebook and noticed the unknown object in the picture. i didn't actually see it before the picture because the sun was bright. i have both pictures (uploaded), taken maybe 30 seconds apart. photos taken with my iphone 4.
content.summary: Tood a picture of the sunrise, posted it to facebook and noticed this.

content.detailedDescription:
After parking my car at around 10:30 as i just got home from school. i collected my belongings from the car closed
the car door and started walking out of the driveway, is when i noticed a buzzing noise and i looked up and didn't
think much of it at first because i live within 3 miles from the newark airport and large planes and helicopters
are a common occurrence. i started walking in to the house and it occurred to me that i could film this thing with
my smart phone. so the video is only 1/4 of the time i was watching it. what was weird about it was it sounded
like it had a propeller like a model plane, but it is illigal to fly any toy aircraft in my area because of the airport.
i stared filming it from my porch and when i did the smartphone flash came on, at that it started moving slowly away in a 
southeast direction to the cornor of the next block, as it moved away 3 lights came on on the bottom red, white and blue
they were triangular but with a circular edge. as far as the objects appeareance it was shaped like a inverted torpedo
orange in color. after it move away i went in the house to get my son to come out to see it before it went out of sight.
we went back outside and i pointed towards the southeast the direction it had gone but it wasn't there anymore, it was right back where
i orginally saw it right above us. it was like it was aware of us being there and stated moving east towards the airport
and then out of sight. with all that said if i had to make a guess it was some kind of survalance drone. 

i'm submitting two versions of the same video the .Wmv is a converted file that i posted on facebook but the other is the original.
content.summary: It sounded like it had a small propeller but it was so low i could see it was shaped like a torpedo

content.detailedDescription: While serving in us navy aboard uss saipan aircraft carrier on duty training pilots,on midnight watch with officer of the deck,we both observed this incedent.None of which was entered in ships log because of fear of ridecule.We both were looking out over the bay and noticed this bright orange object approching the ship about 45 degrees over the horizon,it approced very quickly simply stopped and hovered for a minute or two and  lowered itself into the bay glowing as it dissapeared under the surface of the water.In disbelief of what i had just witnessed i asked the ensign i was on duty with what did we just see ? and should it be entered into the ships log? his reply was we did not see what we had seen and to enter it would cause detrement to both our careers.
content.summary: Flashing orb lowered into pensacola bay

content.detailedDescription:
In my town there is a park right in the center , i was there with a couple of friends having a good time outside in the winter's snow .
suddenly the lights in the city went off , our cellphones stop working , and then in the middle of the sky there were 4 to 6 green flashes that expanded the whole sky , keep pulsing at aprox. 1 second from each other , the flashes were so intense that when it was produced it was obscuring your view for the 1 sec. period . after the flashes went of , the electricity and the mobile network came to normal . what is odd , the electricity company that investigated the "fall" couldn't find anything wrong at the electricity power plant , and when the lights on the street start coming back , they came on stages , one by one . i felt an odd sensation while during the flashes , me and my friends were mesmerized by the event , after that we went to speak with other people in the park , and they also saw it . the origin of the flashes was a small dot , from where it was pulsating with force , the shape is unknown because the flashes were too strong . there was no recorded landings or after-sights of any ufo-objects after that , but it draw some attention from the government since i saw some black helicopters the next several days in the area .
content.summary: Green flashes in the middle of the sky

content.detailedDescription: I'm an experienced ufo watcher and since tonight is the super moon i decided to take a look outside of my window from my home in coral springs, fl facing west towards the everglades.. i then spotted an object in the sky pulsating with the typical colors and hovering in the air like a boat floats on water.. i have the ability to really get a better view of the movements once the crafts circular (magnetic field?) comes into view which takes some focus on my part.. that's how i can get pin point accuracy on the vertical and horizontal movements within the circle.. i then noticed as is always! the case what seems to be a scout plane that always flys just close enough in the direction of the ufo as if to acknowledge that it can be seen.. this plane is not that big and always has a distinct red light that blinks on and off.. upon looking at the plane i noticed that there were about 3 more ufo's both west and south west above and below 30 thousand feet around midnight then gradually hovering down to what appears to be a destination before 3 am all at simultaneous times.. they were all at one point above tree top level then one by one just centered in on an unknown location and were now out of viewing range.. i was very excited and upset at the same time because my iphone couldn't record the activity.. i would love to know what is the best affordable camera i can buy to record such activity? i viewed the ufo's with a decent pair of binoculars but that was not satisfactory for me.. i have been interviewed by both brian vike and jeff rense live on air back in 2005 in regards to other sightings both here and in new york city.. this is nothing new to me but i do see an increase in activity as of late and would like to discuss my findings with mufon in the very near future.. i am more then certain that i can film future activity.. i just need to know what camera to purchase..
content.summary: Pulsating luminous lights with very fast directional changes and hovering..

content.detailedDescription: Talking with friend at work saw object just outside of company property.It appeared at first to resemble maybe some trash picked up by some wind. then i noticed that it was traveling at a level and even rate of speed. it demonstated the "falling leaf" pattern as it moved through the air showing the "topside"towards us then flip up and expose the "bottom" . the top reflected a dull white but the bottom gave the impression of a flat black and flat surface. not quite round but sort of morphing as it traveled, gaining altitude but speed still even. observed an aircraft , private i believe, that flew through the space that the ufo just traversed, and appeared to turn back to check out this object.We watched it for a total of about 10 mins. my mental rolodex was telling me what it was not until i came to the conclusion that we had observed a u f o. not the first for me, but it never fails to amaze one. it ended when it disappeared in a cloud formation at about 30k feet.
content.summary: Near straight line path,reflected light on 1 side, dark shadow on other(bottom?)10 min.Observation very clear

content.detailedDescription: Saw a yellow light--assumed was star about 4 fists high from a seated position, guessing about 25-30 degrees(just over roof tops and a little north of the moon)  aprox location would be in the gen area of the arch.  while i was on the phone with sis, it changed to a bright yellow lighteng bolt looking thing and went straight up.  a second appeared same location same behavior.  about the same time a friend of mine had looked at the moon, snapped a pic and in her pic, there was a red orb.  (i checked the boxes above that sorta match what i saw)
content.summary: Saw yellow star like thing.  then turned to a bright lightening bolt and went straight up.  saw a second same place.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my husband was sitting by our parents pond fishing and it is a clear night full moon only a few stars and next thing we see in the sky from a close distance is something red and flashing and it got closer and stopped above us slowly moving close enough where we seen the shape. it was shaped of a huge triangle opened up in the center with nothing but red flashing lights in the middle. then it started going over the top of us into the neighbors field slowly and disappeared in the sky.
content.summary: Looked like a space ship out of the start track triangle in shape with red flashing orb like lights
